title: Thomas Rhett Stops By And Talks About His Dream Friendship + Bobby Gets To Throw Out First Pitch At Cubs Game
itunes:title: Thomas Rhett Stops By And Talks About His Dream Friendship + Bobby Gets To Throw Out First Pitch At Cubs Game
description:
Thomas Rhett stops by and talks about new music in the works and who his dream friendship would be with. Also, Bobby announces he’ll be throwing out the first pitch at a Cubs game next week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
